> I have decided to implement a RESTful "mail" system.  The design I
> have come up with is incredibly simple, flexible, and (i believe)
> even RESTful (no, really!).  However, before I get too deep into
> its design, I thought I would look around at what others are doing.
> Anyone know of any RESTful (from the ground up, preferably) "mail"
> systems out there already?

I was wondering how RESTful Microsoft HTTPMail spec is after
reading article at http://www.prescod.net/rest/restmail/.

Recently, I found there's a project trying to document/implement
this spec:

    http://httpmail.sourceforge.net/

Maybe you can use this as a basis for your implementation?
It doesn't provide everything you're looking for, but I believe
it could be added without breaking any compatibility.

--
Taisuke Yamada <tai@...>
